name: Vulture
description: The Vulture is a powerhouse of a fighter, equipped with two large hardpoints and exceptional agility. It punches well above its weight class in combat zones and bounty hunting.

name: Mamba
description: The Mamba is an ultra-fast combat ship with high burst damage potential. Designed for hit-and-run tactics, it excels at chasing down fleeing targets.

name: Fer-de-Lance
description: Combining luxury with lethality, the Fer-de-Lance is a favorite among PvP pilots. With one huge hardpoint and excellent speed, it’s a duelist’s dream.

name: Krait Mk II
description: The Krait Mk II is a balanced combat ship with a strong hardpoint layout, fighter bay, and cargo space. A top-tier choice for mission running, bounty hunting, and CZs.

name: Alliance Chieftain
description: The Alliance Chieftain is a hull-tank bruiser. Built to stay in the fight, it performs best under fire and thrives in close-quarters brawls.

name: Alliance Challenger
description: The Challenger is a slightly less nimble but tougher version of the Chieftain, offering improved internals and defensive capabilities.

name: Alliance Crusader
description: The Crusader sacrifices some firepower for a fighter bay, making it ideal for wing support and multi-crew combat.

name: Python Mk II
description: The Python Mk II is a combat-tuned variant of the original Python. It trades cargo space and versatility for better armor, improved hardpoint placement, and enhanced cooling.
